summary: The diff implements the 6-page frontend UI with TanStack Router, a consistent AppShell with top navigation + footer, Tailwind-based clinical theme variables, and mocked UI flows for upload â†’ result, explanation, chat, and report history. It also introduces Internet Identity/auth actor hooks and an empty backend canister actor, which are not part of the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and related identity/session handling
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is UI-focused for a 6-page radiology assistant and does not request authentication or Internet Identity integration.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor wiring/hooks for authenticated/anonymous canister actor creation using react-query
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states UI flow only with no AI integration required; it does not request backend actor setup or query invalidation logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of an (empty) backend canister actor
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is for a frontend modern responsive UI; no backend changes are requested.
